critique: The executive order seems to aim to convey a sense of urgency and importance regarding national defense. It does not seem to want the audience to feel joy. It may want the audience to feel slightly fearful about the state of national defense. It may want the audience to feel slightly surprised that the enlisted strength of the Ready Reserve of the Army Reserve and Marine Corps Reserve cannot be maintained at the necessary level. It does not seem to want the audience to feel sadness, anger, or disgust.
